name: spectre-auto-complete
description: Autocomplete library for spectre css framework https://picturepan2.github.io/spectre/

scripts.build: uglifyjs spectre-auto-complete.js -c -m -o spectre-auto-complete.min.js && uglifycss spectre-auto-complete.css > spectre-auto-complete.min.css

author: laodemalfatih
